name: Cook the Book: Sweet Potato Sausage Stuffing
description: This Sweet Potato Sausage Stuffing from Lyniece North Talmadge's The Sweet Potato Lover's Cookbook is pretty incredible in that it combines three Thanksgiving sides into one—cornbread stuffing plus sausage stuffing plus mashed sweet potatoes. The combo is a savory-sweet-meaty-bready Thanksgiving explosion, ideal for stuffing the bird or as a dressing, cooked on its own.
recipeYield: 10 to 12, enough stuffing for a 16- to 20-pound turkey
recipeIngredient: Two 8-ounce packages corn bread stuffing mix

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350° and spray a large casserole dish with vegetable spray.

Brown the sausage in a skillet. Drain. Sauté the onion, celery, and green pepper in the same skillet until tender. Combine the sausage, vegetables, sweet potatoes, orange peel, and parsley in a large bowl. Add the chicken broth, orange juice, and eggs, blending well. Combine with the stuffing mix. Transfer the stuffing mix to the prepared dish. Bake for 1 hour.
